alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Barnstable, southern Plymouth, southeastern Bristol, Newport, east central Kent and southeastern Bristol Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Portsmouth, or near Bristol, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Plymouth, Barnstable, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Fairhaven and Swansea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
